item.title: Comment on IPFS Support by Timothy Rogers
item.dc:creator: Timothy Rogers
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2018/10/ipfs-support/#comment-907">John Sheppard</a>.
I do not have it, but the issue with adding it to Zadaroo is it has to be CC-0
item.content:encoded:
In reply to John Sheppard.

I do not have it, but the issue with adding it to Zadaroo is it has to be CC-0

item.title: Comment on IPFS Support by John Sheppard
item.dc:creator: John Sheppard
item.description: Do you have Clutterfly mesh mall? Do you want it?
item.content:encoded: Do you have Clutterfly mesh mall? Do you want it?

item.title: Comment on Donor Thanks by Dytska Vieria @ sl
item.dc:creator: Dytska Vieria @ sl
item.description: Thank you Linda. Your creations are just awesome! This is the only way I can find to send a thank you to you and I hope you receive it. Dytska..
item.content:encoded: Thank you Linda. Your creations are just awesome! This is the only way I can find to send a thank you to you and I hope you receive it. Dytska..
